text.en: Outwardly, you are the ācārya Mañjuśrīmitra,
And most secretly, the Dharmarāja Longchenpa—
Dorje Zijitsal, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: dorjé ziji tsal la solwa deb

text.en: With great wisdom, you saw the nature of phenomena,
text.en-trans: sherab chenpö chö kyi denyi zik

text.en: And with great compassion, you care for living beings,
text.en-trans: nyingjé chenpö dro nam jesu dzin

text.en: Guided by your glorious guru, you are a treasure of wisdom and love—
Ngakgi Wangpo, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: ngak gi wangpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Throughout this life, in future lives, and in the bardo state,
text.en-trans: di dang chima bardo tamché du

text.en: Guide me affectionately without ever parting, and grant your blessings
So that I may receive the great secret nectar of ripening empowerments and liberating instructions,
text.en-trans: sang chen dütsi tob né dro kün gyi

text.en: And thereafter bring everlasting benefit and happiness to all beings!
